trans-unit.source: Use the <c>AssignCulture</c> element in your project file to create and execute this task.
For usage and parameter information, see [AssignCulture Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f8314cc-82a6-4f16-a62d-b9f0d1d5e274).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture" /> class.
Gets a list of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" /> with a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry added to each item.
The list of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" />, with a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry added to each item.
trans-unit.target: A lista de <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files" />, com um <c>cultura</c> adicionada a cada item de entrada de metadados.

trans-unit.source: If the incoming item from the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files%2A> property already contains a `Culture` metadata entry, the original metadata entry is used.
trans-unit.target: Se a entrada do item do <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.Files%2A> propriedade já contém um `Culture` a entrada de metadados, a entrada de metadados original é usada.

trans-unit.source: The task only assigns a `Culture` metadata entry if the file name contains a valid culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: A tarefá atribuirá uma entrada de metadados `Culture` somente se o nome de arquivo contiver um identificador de cultura válido.

trans-unit.source: The culture identifier must be between the last two dots in the filename.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de cultura deve estar entre os dois últimos pontos no nome de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> que têm um <c>cultura</c> entrada de metadados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> que não têm um <c>cultura</c> entrada de metadados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
A subset of <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> that do not have a <c>Culture</c> metadata entry.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AssignCulture.AssignedFiles" /> que não têm um <c>cultura</c> entrada de metadados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets a list of files with embedded culture names to assign a culture to.
The list of files with embedded culture names to assign a culture to.
trans-unit.target: A lista de arquivos com nomes de cultura incorporada para atribuir uma cultura para.
